overview: Tamara has Intellectual disability and a love for ladybugs. One day, she decides to take care of a baby but she forgets where she took him from, so she will get assistance from the old lady who sell quesadillas so they can return the baby to his parents.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

title: Tamara and the Ladybug
